Text:
i have set up my custom res 1360x768 to change go in to doomconfig.ini in mod folder and change these

seta r_customHeight "768"
seta r_customWidth "1360"

seta r_aspectRatio "1"     0=4:3 1=16:9 2=16:10

i am running on 2.2 duo 2gb ram and gtx260  
so have not turned on ssao, soft shadows, ssil as pc pc cant handle them but turned off motion blur and DOF as dont like blur you cant change anything as you need in game on the fly
let me know how this plays on your pc
sorry you CAN change settings in game
What version of the game does these mods require?
if any1 has problem just let me know what system you have and i will see what i can do
